name: JigsawMania
description: JigsawMania brings classic jigsaw puzzle fun to your computer! Access over 6,000 puzzle images from WallpaperFusion, choose from multiple difficulty levels, save images for offline use, and much more.4 Difficulty LevelsTry Beginner (3x3), Easy (5x5), Medium (8x8), and Hard (12x12) difficulty modes. Earn achievements for each difficulty level, and earn more reputation points for harder puzzles to complete on the JigsawMania leaderboards!Access New Images DailyEvery day the WallpaperFusion community submits new images, and everyday these images are filtered and approved for you to use in JigsawMania! Create a WallpaperFusion account and JigsawMania will keep track of which images you've already completed.LeaderboardsCompete on the JigsawMania leaderboards simply by creating a WallpaperFusion account and completing puzzles. Can you reach the top each month?
